title: Ping spikes in 7.3
body: Ever since patch 7.3 came in I've kept getting ping high ping,from my normal (from 35-45 ) to my nowdays ping (45-16010(my record)) without having any other program opened and no one else using my internet.Playing any other games like Hearthstone or Paladins cause me no problem while League is just unplayable.I've  tried blocking my anti-virus and turing off firewall,but problem is still there. Any help? Thanks in advance!

replies.body:
Latency (ping) spikes can occur for a few different reasons, but they're a definite indication that there's an issue between your PC and our servers. As your first step in troubleshooting this, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues), as it will ensure you aren't running any network settings that conflict with League.

Let me know if this helped.
